name: Symptom of love
description:
The main character, his name is Tetsuya. He is a 3rd year university student, wants to become a programmer and earn a lot of money. In the past, Tetsuya with his friends wanted to create a game, but nothing came of it. Now he spends his days at the university carefree. On one of these beautiful days, he almost dies.In the hospital, he realizes that he has done nothing in this life. Also saw photos of a girl been in love with for a long time. Somehow it affected this jerk, and he decides to change his life. Tetsuya goes to his best friend Hayate for help. They decide to assemble a team and make a game. This time they want to finish the job, don't you want to take a look at this wonderful process?

In the game, we focus primarily on humor, and we hope that other people will understand this. The game is made in the genre of visual novels, so the gameplay is appropriate. We also added one mini-game, several endings, enough options, as well as an interesting story. We hope you enjoy it!
